name: I Am Gangster
description:
It is a 2D Deck Building, Turn-Based Strategy game. Use your custom deck to take over 8 different cities in the world(only 1 In Early Access). Defeat the enemy gang to claim victory over the city. Use cars/motorbikes and scooters to complete missions against the enemy gang. Everything gangster related will be in this game!

After Early Access release, I will be working on

-----World Events
-----Completing the other cities
-----More awesome cards
-----A gangster weapon experience system(the more they use a certain weapon.. the more damage they will do
-----Different types of transformations(blue wings, white wings, black wings, gold wings)
----- Constant quality of life improvements and balancing the game
----- Improve card graphics
